Advanced Traffic Technology

Smart Traffic Management Features

Leverage cutting-edge ANPR technology to create intelligent traffic systems that adapt, respond, and optimize urban mobility in real-time.

Real-time Traffic Monitoring
Monitor traffic flow and vehicle counts across multiple lanes and intersections in real-time.
Adaptive Signal Control
Automatically adjust traffic signal timing based on current traffic conditions and patterns.
Incident Detection
Instantly detect traffic incidents, accidents, and unusual vehicle behavior for rapid response.
Congestion Analytics
Analyze traffic patterns, peak hours, and congestion hotspots with comprehensive reporting.
Journey Time Monitoring
Track vehicle journey times between checkpoints for route optimization and planning.
Speed Enforcement
Automated speed monitoring and enforcement with accurate license plate capture.
